sentence.Network_en: The banks should have been more circumspect in their dealings.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些银行在交易中本该更加谨慎的。

sentence.Network_en: She is very circumspect when dealing with strangers.
sentence.Network_cn: 她与陌生人打交道时十分谨慎.

sentence.Network_en: You seem to be implying, in your usual circumspect manner, that perhaps it might not be a wonderful idea.
sentence.Network_cn: 你好像正以你一贯谨言慎行的方式暗示，那个主意也许不怎么样。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... circumscribe vt. 限制 circumspect adj. 慎重的；小心的 cistern ? n. 贮水器,水箱.
英语单词记忆法_百度知道 ... spectator 旁观者 circumspect 小心，谨慎? expect 盼望，期待.
VIDEO GAME WARS:_在线英语听力室 ... ) component n. 成分，因素 ) circumspect a. 慎重的，周到的 ) converge v. 会聚.
circumscribe 限制,立界限circumspect 慎重,小心的circumstance 情况

list.abs: Physicians are now more circumspect about recommending its use ., 现在的医生在推荐使用该药物时更加慎重了.
He decided to be more circumspect ., 他决定要多加小心.
She is very circumspect when dealing with strangers ., 她与陌生人打交道时十分谨慎.
The patient meliorate very well after two weeks circumspective treatment ., 病人经过两个礼拜的精心治疗 , 恢复得很好.
什么意思... ... Increased Circumspect 有增无减 circumspect marketing 精细化营销 Circumspect Service 礼遇服务.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin circumspectus, from circumspicere 'look around', from circum 'around, about' + specere 'look'

entry.tran: 小心的;谨慎的;谨言慎行的
entry.def: If you are circumspect, you are cautious in what you do and say and do not take risks.

example.ex: The banks should have been more circumspect in their dealings...
example.tran: 那些银行在交易中本该更加谨慎的。

example.ex: You seem to be implying, in your usual circumspect manner, that perhaps it might not be a wonderful idea.
example.tran: 你好像正以你一贯谨言慎行的方式暗示，那个主意也许不怎么样。

sentences.sentence: "physicians are now more circumspect about recommending its use"

auth_sentence.content: He is polite but circumspect and almost a little nervy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He is polite but circumspect and almost a little nervy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is polite but circumspect and almost a little nervy.

auth_sentence.content: The brothels were quiet, orderly and circumspect.
auth_sentence.res_content: The brothels were quiet, orderly and circumspect.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The brothels were quiet, orderly and circumspect.

auth_sentence.content: Counterterrorism officials say they will be circumspect with the data.
auth_sentence.res_content: Counterterrorism officials say they will be circumspect with the data.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Counterterrorism officials say they will be circumspect with the data.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面
stems_affixes.word_buile: a加强意义+spect看→看的东西→外表,容貌
circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

stems_affixes.value_cn: 章程,内容简介;创办计划
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前+spect看+us→向前看的东西
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.cn: 她与陌生人打交道时十分谨慎。
